text: was a Japanese daimyō of the early Edo period, who ruled the Chōshū Domain. ==Family== *Father: Mōri Terumoto (1553–1625) *Wife: Kisahime (1598–1655) daughter of Yūki Hideyasu and adopted daughter of Tokugawa Hidetada ==References== * Mōri genealogy on "Edo 300 HTML" (30 Oct. 2007) Category:1595 births Category:1651 deaths Category:Mōri clan Category:Daimyo
title: Mōri Hidenari
